"Don't get up, continue to work" you say quickly, as you approaching her and kiss her on the cheek.
"What brought you here, Obi Wan?" She asked with joy.
"Oh, I just wanted to know how are doing. To see you in the flesh. This war seems like never ending... It's really difficult to save basic human connections during all this." You say, as you're walking across the room.
"Well, as you can see, I'm working on the new anti-war bill" Said Padme, going back to work.
You walk behind her(the office was very spacious) to see what is she taping.
"It's a new bill proposed by me, Bail Organa and Mon Mothma" She starts to explain you, but something else caught your eye. You notice her feet under the chair she was sitting on. They were crossed at the ankles and her bare soles were popping out of her high-heeled black shoes.
Your heart started to bear faster. You could see her smooth bare heels, lovely high arches. On one foot you could even see her dainty toes, on the tips of which was hanging her shoe.

143.content:
(This takes place on Tatoine during the events of the Phantom Menace.)

You were a middle class moisture farmer in the dunes of Tatoine just off of the city of Mos Eisley. You lived alone with the exception of two droids who helped keep the place in shape and you had a spare room which you occasionally put up for rent. You had received a message saying the bounty hunter Aurra Sing would like to rent the room out for a while so she can wrap up some “loose ends.” You weren’t too keen on the idea of a bounty hunter staying in your home but the money she offered was far to tempting to turn down. You accepted reluctantly . Two days later she had arrived.


You heard a knocking at your door so you went to open it and check on who it was. When you opened the door a tall skinny woman with paper white skin and a red skin tight suit on was standing there with a rifle slung over her shoulder and bags in her hands.

“Ram Talas I hope?” Aurra said with a frown

“Yes ma’am it is. Are you the one renting out the room?” You say

“I am. May I come in?” She says with a certain sense of politeness that took you buy suprise.

“Be my guest.” You say as she walks in and makes herself familiar with the place.

“Do you by any chance have something I could eat? It’s been a long day.” Aurra says clearly tired from her journey.

“Yes supper is actually being prepared by my droids right now. It should be ready soon. Why don’t you make yourself comfortable.” You say sitting down on the couch in the living room.

“Thanks. I think I will.” She says as she sits down next to you and takes her long black boots off revealing a pair of black socks and a pair of nice pale legs. “You don’t mind do you?” She says with a smile.

“No not at all do as you wish.” You say as a scent of cheese and popcorn fill your nostrils.


How do you get her feet?
